title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.36 - DO NOT DRIVE ON SHOULDER Sign (R4-17) and DO NOT PASS ON SHOULDER Sign (R4-18)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.36 - DO NOT DRIVE ON SHOULDER Sign (R4-17) and DO NOT PASS ON SHOULDER Sign (R4-18)

State Regulations
DELETE the entire section; the R4-17 and R4-18 signs shall
not be used in New York. See Section
2B.107
for more
information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
